attributes.action: reduce the amount of imagrents coming into to the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are to many for foreign people coming in the uk which gives the british people less jobs for there own. i think we have to reduce the numbers to save some jobs (that are for ever getting reduced)for our future the children!
